text:
Mich'mich is lying down on the sidewalk, alone.. It's raining and a strong wind is blowing.
It's 4pm and John, a 9 years old boy is coming, accompanied by what seems to be his older brother, Lenon, after a long day of school.
Both boys look excited, this sensation is enhanced by the rain, and the younger one is jumping into puddles. Suddenly, his eyes stop on our poor hero.
What is happening?

Oh great, poor Mich'mich is not alone anymore! Our two little boys are going back home with their new friend.
During dinner, John presents his parents with their marvelous find. But Mich'mich is still wet and his beautiful fur, which once was white and cream, is now dirty and grey.
John and Lennon's mother enters in a terrible fury: "You must not pick up random stuff in the streets, even if it looks abandoned and pretty. You don't know where it comes from,
and it can belong to someone who lost it. Tomorrow I want you both to put it back where you found it".
Disappointed, John goes to bed. After a good night and a delicious breakfast, the brothers head to the school and stop to the place they found Mich'mich the day before.
What will the boys do?

Heartbroken, John puts Mich'mich on a small wall and they leave. Once again, the poor 
little sheep is alone. Unfortunately, this day is garbage collection day. At 10am the waste 
truck comes and the plush is taken into the waste disposal by the driver. Mich’mich is 
drowned under tons of waste and is crushed. The damage is too great. He will never recover 
and joins plush Heaven.

John tries negotiating to keep the plush but Lenon refuses and after a terrible argument 
the little boy resigns, puts Mich'mich on a small wall and they leave. Once again, the poor 
little sheep is alone. Unfortunately, this day is garbage collection day. At 10am the waste 
truck comes and the plush is taken into the waste disposal by the driver. Mich’mich is 
drowned under tons of waste and is crushed. The damage is too great. He will never recover 
and joins plush heaven.

John approaches to catch the plush but his brother stops him:  \”Don’t touch this thing, it’s 
dirty and we’re getting late for our snack time”\. Little John nods and they both leave, 
following  their stomach growls.
Suddenly, a gust of wind pushes Mich’mich onto the road just in front of Lance Armstrong 
who was at the time on his bike fleeing from the sportive authorities.
What is happening?

Little John jumps on the plush without any remorse as if it was a simple waste. The boys 
are going back home, both singing in the rain and thinking about the snack that is awaiting 
them at home. As the seam slowly unties, Mich’mich starts to lose his left ear.
Suddenly, a gust of wind pushes Mich’mich onto the road just in front of Lance Armstrong 
who was at the time on his bike fleeing from the sportive authorities.
What is happening?

Thanks to his incredible capacities, Lance manages to avoid Mich’mich despite the 
incredible speed his powerful legs make him cycle. Mister Armstrong still has the time to 
notice the small and super cute plush that almost killed him. 
What will be his reaction?

Lance is going so fast on his bike that he can’t avoid the small plush. In a last desperate 
effort to stop his fast-approaching bike before reaching it, Mister Armstrong falls on the 
ground, face to face with Mich’mich. His knees hurt pretty badly.  
How will Lance react to this?

The following morning, Isaac and his mother are going to the boy’s school. On their road, 
they find the little plush which seems to have suffered. Isaac’s mother is the tender of 
National Plush Shelter of this neighbourhood, so she decides to take Mich’mich to the 
shelter to find him a new home.

After examination it appears that the plush has been through too much damage and 
cannot be sold anymore. The decision is taken to throw him away, forever

After examination, Isaac’s mother finds out that the plush is in a good enough state to be 
sold and puts Mich’mich into the shop window. Mich’mich’s human, who was desperate to 
see their beloved plush again is walking around in their neighbourhood. As they pass in front 
of the NPS they visit regularly, something catches their eyes. Mich’mich was in the shop 
window, ready to be sold!  Such joy glows in the heart of this human as they take back the 
desired one, hugging and swearing that now every bag will be equipped with a safety belt! 
<3.

Lance decides that the plush is sooo cute that he can’t leave it lying on the ground. 
He brings it to the nearest National Plush Shelter with the hope that the person who lost it will 
find it there.
The following day, the sun shines high in the sky. Mich’mich’s human, who was desperate to 
see their beloved plush again is walking around in their neighbourhood. As they pass in front 
of the NPS they visit regularly, something catches their eyes. Mich’mich was in the shop 
window, ready to be sold!  Such joy glows in the heart of this human as they take back the 
desired one, hugging and swearing that now every bag will be equipped with a safety belt! 
<3.

Lance is so mad of falling because of a tiny and dirty plush that someone carelessly left 
on the ground that he needs to hit it before leaving! Mich’mich is hurt pretty bad! His forelegs 
are starting to rip off…
